properties.Name: ComponentReading
properties.Description: The reading associated with the component for a period.

Columns.Name: ComponentId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Component.

Columns.Name: ReadingTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Reading Type

Columns.Name: ReadingStartTimestamp
Columns.Description: The period start timestamp for which the associated reading is reported.

Columns.Name: ReadingEndTimestamp
Columns.Description: The period end timestamp for which the associated reading is reported.

Columns.Name: ReadingValue
Columns.Description: The value of the associated reading.

Columns.Name: ReadingUnits
Columns.Description: The measurement units for the associated reading.

Columns.Name: UnitOfMeasureId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Unit Of Measure.

Columns.Name: ScheduleReadingTimestamp
Columns.Description: The timestamp of the scheduled reading of the testing equipment of the associated reading type.

Columns.Name: ComponentReadingStatusId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Component Reading Status.

Columns.Name: ReadingModeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Reading Mode.

Columns.Name: ReadingResultTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Reading Result Type.

Columns.Name: ComponentReadingNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding a Component Reading.

Columns.Name: PiPointId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a PI Point.
